name: Lawman Jr! An edited version for your dumb kids!
name_original: Lawman Jr! An edited version for your dumb kids!
description:
This is literally exactly the same core book as Lawman, with a Nickelodeon Orange cover and all the profanity and fun stuff taken out of it so your kid can look at it.

It's also a piece of total spite, intended to be a joke, is probably less playable than the original, and also costs $5 more dollars because of hatred and to keep you from actually considering this a viable product.

It still features themes of violence in space, but you know what? It doesn't have f-bombs. So pick and choose your battles, parents.

I expect nobody to purchase this, and if you do, you deserve the $5 price hike.
